tuv.seg: The Irish Constitution guarantees the people of Ireland certain fundamental rights
Bronann Bunreacht na hÉireann cearta bunúsacha ar phobal na hÉireann
Sometimes, the Gardai or the prosecution in a case can obtain evidence for a trial in breach of your fundamental rights
In amanna, is féidir leis na Gardaí nó leis na cúisitheoirí i gcás fianaise a fháil ar bhealach a sháraíonn do chearta bunúsacha
This means that the evidence has been got in circumstances where your constitutional rights have not been respected
Sa chás sin tá fianaise faighte acu i gcúinsí nach raibh omós tugtha do na cearta bunreachtúla atá agat
It has been held by the courts that evidence obtained in "deliberate and conscious" breach of your constitutional rights is inadmissible
Rialaigh na cúirteanna nach bhfuil fianaise a fritheadh ar bhealach a sháraigh "d'aonturas agus go fiosach" do chearta bunreachtúla ceadaithe
"Deliberate and conscious" does not mean "intentionally" or "maliciously"
Ní ionann "d'aonturas agus go fiosach" agus "beartaithe" nó "go mailíseach"
It can include a situation where the breach of your constitutional rights was an inadvertent mistake
D'fhéadfadh sé gur sáraíodh do chearta bunreachtúla mar bhotún gan cuimhneamh
An example of evidence obtained in breach of your constitutional rights would be evidence found in your dwelling by the Gardai without a search warrant
Mar shampla bheadh fianaise a fuair Gardaí i d'áit chónaithe gan barántas cuardaithe a bheith ina seilbh ina sárú ar do chearta bunreachtúla
This is a breach of your constitutional right not to have your dwelling violated without your consent except in accordance with law
Is sárú é seo ar do cheart bunreachtúil gan sárú a dhéanamh ar d'áit chónaithe gan do chead ach amháin de réir an dlí
Evidence obtained on foot on an unlawful arrest or detention is also inadmissible
Fianaise neamhcheadaithe í fianaise a fuarthas de bharr gabhála nó coinneála a bhí neamhdhleathach
In some situations, evidence may be obtained in breach of legislation rather than in breach of the Constitution
In amanna, d'fhéadfadh sé go raibh fianaise faighte ar bhealach a sháraigh an reachtaíocht seachas an Bunreacht
For example, you have no constitutional right to be told that you have a right to see a solicitor while you are in detention
Mar shampla, níl aon cheart bunreachtúil agat é a bheith curtha in iúl duit go bhfuil sé de cheart agat dlíodóir a fheiceáil nuair atá tú dhá choinneáil
However, the Criminal Justice Acts do require that your right to legal access be brought to your attention
Ach faoi na hAchtanna um Dlí Choiriúil tá sé leagtha síos gur ceart tú a chur ar an eolas go bhfuil sé de cheart agat ionadaíocht dlíthiúil a bheith agat
If you are not told about your right to see a solicitor and you then make a statement to the police, that evidence is not automatically inadmissible
Muna n-insítear duit go bhfuil sé de cheart agat dlíodóir a fheiceáil agus má dhéanann tú ráiteas do na Gardaí ní gá go mbeadh an fhianaise sin neamhcheadaithe
It is up to the judge to decide whether or not to allow it to be introduced as evidence
Tá sé suas chuig an mbreitheamh cinneadh a dhéanamh an féidir an fhianaise sin a tharraingt anuas
For more detailed information you should seek legal advice
Ba chóir duit comhairle dlí a lorg chun faisnéis mionsonraithe a fháil
